Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.Archipelago

Class IslandTile

it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.BoardPiece

it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.PawnContainer<Student>
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.BoardElements.StudentContainer
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.Archipelago.IslandTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlaceAndRemoveStudent, Serializable
public class IslandTile extends StudentContainer
Class that models a single island tile which can host mother nature, a tower and contain students.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • IslandTile

      public IslandTile(Player player, boolean isStarting, IslandGroup islandGroup)
      Creates IslandTile with owner and maxPawns. If it's a starting island, also instantiates MotherNature
      Parameters:
      player - the player who owns the container
      isStarting - whether this IslandTile should instantiate (and hold) MotherNature

  • Method Details

    • placeMotherNature

      public void placeMotherNature(MotherNature motherNature)
      Places MotherNature on IslandTile
      Parameters:
      motherNature - a reference to the Mother Nature object

    • removeMotherNature

      public MotherNature removeMotherNature()
      Removes MotherNature from IslandTile, thus leaving it null
      Returns:
      a reference to the Mother Nature object

    • hasMotherNature

      public boolean hasMotherNature()
      Returns true if it holds MotherNature
      Returns:
      true if this tile contains Mother Nature, false otherwise

    • getTowerColor

      public TowerColor getTowerColor()
      Getter for the Tower
      Returns:
      the tower color on this tile

    • getTowerID

      public Integer getTowerID()

    • swapTower

      public Tower swapTower(Tower tower)
      Swaps and returns current Tower with given tower. Returns null if no tower was placed beforehand
      Parameters:
      tower - the future tower to swap with the current one
      Returns:
      the tower previously placed on this tile, or null if there was none

    • getIslandGroup

      public IslandGroup getIslandGroup()
      Getter for the IslandGroup
      Returns:
      the islandgroup that contains this tile

    • setIslandGroup

      public void setIslandGroup(IslandGroup islandGroup)
      Setter for the IslandGroup
      Parameters:
      islandGroup - the islandgroup that will contain this tile

    • countInfluence

      public int countInfluence(Color color)
      Counts number of students with given Color
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the students to check
      Returns:
      the number of students on this tile with the given color
